ProductInfo.Features:
Simplified UI: Easy to find any app you wanted. My mom and I no longer have to learn how to use the tablet. With bumper, the device is safe for dropping.
Pre-install educational apps for child to learn letter, words, number, sharps...in a fun way!
The Wireless Joysticks can only used for Games with virtual button mappings or in the Game Emulators of your Android tablet.
Support eBooks and audio books. Pre-loaded kindle and iStorybook.
Setting time limit or managing content and apps to ensure your children have a safe, healthy and fun journal with AGPTekAbot tablet.
ProductInfo.Name: AGPtek® 7" Kids Children Tablet PC Pre-installed Educational & Reading Apps Android 4.1 Parent Control Unique UI RED Bumper & Wireless Gamepad
